name: Elgar 2D RPG - for portfolio
description:
Controls (Keyboard/Controller):

  • Interact - F/X
  • Pause - P/Y
  • Movement - WASD/Analog Stick

Patches coming as tests are running, hopefully on a weekly/bi-weekly basis.

You can turn down the sound in the settings menu

Thank you for testing my game and hopefully reporting anything that breaks on you.

Credits for things:

Music - https://www.fantasymusica.org/

Characters - Art by Antifarea, Commissioned by OpenGameArt.org (http://opengameart.org)
